BY SPECIFIC ORDER About us : Listed among the top ‚ÄúHidden Gems of Florida", Bob's River Place is a Privately Owned Popular Swimming Hole located on the Famous Suwannee River in Branford, Florida. Described as "Swiss Family Robinson meets Wild Adventure", the Property is Decked out with Tree Houses, Rope Swings, Water Slides, Floating Sunbathing Rafts, Splash Pads, Jumping Platforms, Log Rolling, Karaoke, Water & Land Volleyball, Floating Rafts For Playing "King of the Dock", Picnic Tables and Barbecue Grills. ‚Äã You can pack charcoal for grilling, food, cooler for drinks (but no alcohol). To Follow our Official Facebook Page, Select the appropriate Icon at the bottom of this page " This is Florida's best kept Secret!! A great day for good old fashion fun!!!"... Megan Engelhorn I‚Äôd go here over any concrete theme park any day"... Karen Ann Davis "This is an awesome place! What a treat!"... Megan Richie "We thought, okay, a couple hours (like 2) to do slides and rope swings. OHHHHHHH NOOOOOO , hours of entertainment. FUN!!!!!!"...Allison Lytle ‚ÄùThis place was EPIC. I will definitely be back soon"...Tony Stark "Bob's is the best spot in Florida period!!! It's absolutely amazing. We love it!!! ... April Elizabeth Greene BIO_CV END FOOTERS START

BY SPECIFIC ORDER What People are Saying: : Reviews from Season 2019 ‚ÄúThis place is definitely worth it!!! The property is clean, everyone is very nice and it is such a fun and exhilarating experience!!! If you want to face your fears, this is the place!!! I am already planning another trip. I give it 10 stars!!!!‚Äù .. Pamela Lynne ‚ÄúThe Rope Swings are Top Notch!‚Äù.. Daniel Aumack ‚ÄúI have been cliff diving in St Thomas. I have snorkeled in the Keys. I have been whitewater rafting and snow skiing, but Bob's River Place tops them all! It is the single most exhilarating place we‚Äôve ever experienced. If you desire to test your limits and overcome your fears while having some good old fashioned fun, you must make the trek to Bob's!‚Äù ... John R. Evans, Oviedo "Now days, you can only find fun like this overseas" ... Chris Hind "Thank you, Mr. Bob, for opening up your home and heart to us. We are forever grateful for you!" ... Mary King ‚ÄúA++++ Nothing but laughs and a damn good time. Everyone should experience this natural place‚Äù ... Simone Taylor ‚ÄúWhen you pull onto the property, it's like you've been transported back in time, before people knew about cell phones. Old fashioned fun!‚Äù ... John Revans ‚ÄúReminds me of old Florida‚Äù ... Kelley Parmer Thomason. "Thank you, Mr. Bob, for having changed over one-thousand lives with you and your family‚Äôs acts of kindness and creativity. The river place is amazing and continues to bring happiness and joy to everyone that goes." ..... Scott McKenzie, Jacksonville "Best place I've ever come across in my life. I had the best vacation because I went there" ... H. Russell ‚ÄúBob's River Place is one of the best hidden gems florida has to offer! If you're an adrenaline junkie this is the place for you! The owner Bob and his staff are such a sweethearts and very welcoming!‚Äù ... Vanessa Thebossyone Dale, Miami ‚ÄúI love this place! A natural water park on the river, fun for the whole family. I take it over Disney anytime‚Äù ... Anabel Michelena , Jacksonville ‚ÄúBrought 20 people in our group ... was absolutely awesome!!!! We will definitely be back!!!! Made the 3 hr drive from St.Pete to come... totally worth it!!‚Äù ... Cameron Stauffer , St Petersburg "Bob's brings so much joy to so many people" .... Sherri Mikita, Sarasota ‚ÄúWe love you Mr. Bob‚Äù ... Lauren Honeycutt I‚Äôve been to Bob‚Äôs 7 times now. On the first visit, it became my favorite place to be. After 7, it has not lost a bit of its splendor. Beautiful environment that‚Äôs both fun and relaxing‚Äù ... Jonathon Rice "Keeps our younger generation busy and off the streets" ... Lindsey Weddle ‚ÄúA Throwback to those good old days of clean fun"... Brandon Gill ‚ÄúBest Kept Secret...so many fun memories there!‚Äù ... Jackie Leigh ‚ÄúWorkers and Patrons are Friendly as can be. Definitely a Place to take family and friends.‚Äù ... Frank Pirrone ‚ÄúI took a car load of fourteen year old boys to Bob‚Äôs yesterday and they had a blast! No cell phones, no technology, just having fun outdoors with friends. We stayed from open to close and they would have stayed longer. Facility is clean, staff was friendly. We will definitely be back! I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!! A hidden gem near Jax‚Äù ... Alison Ragsdale Olecki , St. Johns ‚ÄùThe place is amazing, clean and has so much to do...and the staff is so friendly!!! we will absolutely will return...LOVED it!!!‚Äù ... Summer Lei McDaniel, Sumter, South Carolina ‚ÄúHighly recommend!!! Would chose Bobs any day over any water theme park! Thank you Bob! We had a blast in the short time we were there. Definitely will be back soon‚Äù... Paula Williams ‚ÄúHad a great time ... The slides are my favorite. My kids and husband loved the rope swings. Everyone was nice and chill. The rope helpers were actually really helpful and patient with people. We will be back soon‚Äù... Sabrina Post, St Augustine ‚ÄúSo fun ... No one leaves trash, no one messes with your stuff, everyone respects each other and watches out for each other! THANK YOU BOB!!‚Äù... Joe N Kristi Courtney ‚Äã ‚ÄúGood clean fun old-school style. Don‚Äôt find that often. Had a great time‚Äù... Steve Simpson ‚ÄúWe visited this place for the first time last weekend with a group of friends. I am SO glad we went!‚Äù ... Karrie Jo Burton ‚Äã ‚ÄúBob's Place was absolutely AMAZING!! Endless fun for everyone. We will DEFINITELY be back‚Äù... Nikka Brooks, Jacksonville ‚ÄùFeeling Alive. It was a perfect day! ‚ô•Ô∏è this place! The day was filled with thriller screams and smiles‚Äù... Sherri Mikita, Sarasota ‚ÄúFirst time there and all I can say is WOW! This is definitely a must do ... This man has generously gone overboard to please a bunch of strangers. Kudos to Bob! Great place! Thanks for opening your place up for all to enjoy.‚Äù ... Lori Dickson ‚ÄúThis is one of the last true places in Florida that will no doubt given your children lifetime memories of their Childhood! ‚ù§Ô∏è The first time I‚Äôve ever given out 5 stars. This place is awesome‚Äù... Greg Hammock, Orlando We are from North Georgia on Vacation. We want to tell you Thank You for such an awesome day at your home. Thank you! ... The White Family, North Georgia (left by personal note after hours at the front gate) Finally went and regret that I haven't been going all these years ü§® IT'S A BLAST !! ... Tara Sandlin, Branford As a lifelong Floridian, I've never heard of this place - what a shame. It was AWESOME!! .... Slides, rope swings, high platform, and so much more. Truly a best kept secret .... Mark Goldwich , Jacksonville August ... Omg, we had a blast today. My friends and I had been talking about heading to Bobs for sometime now and after today, I wish we hadn't waited so long. This was a truly awesome experience. Well worth the drive from Jacksonville; all day fun! ‚ÄúSo much to do, we will be back!!!!!!‚Äù... Shayla Bogart, Lakeland, Florida ‚ÄùThis is the place to B ...
